website_summaries.verdict: This kit is great for the do-it-yourselfers, or contractors who need to cut holes from time to time. It's not as good for plumbers, or others who cut holes on a daily basis.
pros: Includes 9 hole saws measuring 3/4 to 2-1/2 inches
Comes with 2 arbors and 2 pilot bits
Arbors change out quickly and easily
Matrix II bi-metal construction for greater durability
Precision-ground tooth geometry for fast cutting
Positive rake angle for better cutting
Radiused back face reduces wear and tear
cons: May not work well on stainless steel

customer_reviews.title: Hole Dozer
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee has been making great tools for years and I knew that when it came to do wood working projects, I could always count on them. Excellent product and it will last years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Clubbinator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: If you are a professional plumber and bore thousands of the same size holes, it makes sense to get super-heavy-duty hole saws with their own arbors. If you are a DIYer or even a contractor that doesn't bore that many holes, then this kit is a great value. The arbors are cleverly designed to change out quickly and easily. I've used cheaper versions of this tool in the past that required a crescent wrench and a pair of channel locks to get apart. Not so with these. If you define value in terms of quality per money spent, then the value of this set is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. McKee

customer_reviews.title: BEST BITS FOR THE $
customer_reviews.text: I don't use hole saws all the time but I have used many different brands over the years. I had to bore several different size holes in 1/8 and 3/16 steel and the punched through them like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Acejewell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these several times now and they are GREAT! Wood and aluminum mostly but on a farm you can never tell what will come up next! Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ranchwife

customer_reviews.title: Fair value for the money
customer_reviews.text: They make round holes of accurate size. I got some burning cutting holes in baltic birch plywood. May have been my fault (too much pressure?). I'll clean the burnt-on crud off the blades and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great hole saws.
customer_reviews.text: These are great hole saws. Just bear in mind to secure your work before you start drilling. The saws really bite hard into the material and will spin your work and jump out of the hole. I imagine this will decrease in time as the blades get some wear on them.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin R. Stiff, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Dull quickly
customer_reviews.text: Went full in less than 10 holes drilled, in quarter inch, cabinet backs. Very cheap steel. Nice box though.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: HVAC guy loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fathers day present for my husband. HE LOVES IT. Best way to buy hole saws in in a kit for his profession. He is an HVAC guy and loves his tools. He was impressed with quality of the arbhors and was thrilled by the selection of sizes. All in a an easy to carry case. And, with a name like Milwaulkee, You know its a quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bauhoff

customer_reviews.title: Cuts clean every time
customer_reviews.text: I've not used them a tonne, but each time they have worked well. A good clean cut. Bore circle has also been easy to remove from the bit.
customer_reviews.author: Yessirri Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best hole saw set ever
customer_reviews.text: Easy to switch saw sizes and easy to remove cut pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: For small jobs around the house these are really good but sadly not the best on the market for tougher projects
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love it---the best hole saws i ever owned--great company to do business with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good kit for the price. Milwaukee does a great job with their drills and drill accessories.
customer_reviews.author: balticsea123

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a new set as mine were over 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new set as mine were over 10 years old. I am a cabinet maker so I use them quite often on installs. They hold an edge much longer then the competition!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Hole saws, they saw holes. Quality seems fine, does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: DJ BOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Great for grommets
customer_reviews.text: Used this to create add grommets to my desk. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: T.Tech

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee is great.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a strong, thick case. I use these all the time, and they work very well. The different sizes have also come in handy, saving me trips to Home Depot. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: electrolyte

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: Good for about 2-3 uses, then become too dull to cut anything.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fluhman

customer_reviews.title: This kit is awesome. They are easy to attach and remove
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome. They are easy to attach and remove. No free spinning and wobbling around.
customer_reviews.author: RonS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for 75 bucks. Got a couple of them for my employees for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jay

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. Works great on aluminum from .080 to 1/4".
customer_reviews.author: Taran Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit with quality saw blades
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit with quality saw blades. Would be nice if the hex keys needed to hold drill bit and saw blade were included.
customer_reviews.author: bart58

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: I've used these before. They'll last a long time for wood use, you'll get a few cuts out of soft metal and they'll be trashed after one stainless steel cut. It's a good utility set but not for pros.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. leeTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit disappointed. Milwaukee usually blows me away with their tools
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed. Milwaukee usually blows me away with their tools. The screw threads had burrs in them which made putting the nut on my hand impossible. Still, it does the job and make holes nicely!
customer_reviews.author: A. Braun

customer_reviews.title: ... believe I waited to long to buy a kit like this. I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I waited to long to buy a kit like this. I use it all the time. I do wish that the smaller arbor used the same locking pins mechanism as the larger one. Instead, the bits are strictly threaded on and by the time I'm done drilling a hole, the bit is on the arbor so tight that I have to use two pliers to loosen it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Klarr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Milwaukee product!
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality bits. Good quality case. The arbors are nicely oiled from the factory. The saws are heavy gauge metal. Exactly what I'd expect from a Milwaukee product. My ONLY issue: The size markings are on the side of the bits. So once you use them a couple times, you can't see it anymore. Of course, most manufacturers do this (I don't know why). The marking should be stamped on the TOP of the bit (and if they wanted to be frickin awesome, put it on the inside as well), and painted so you can see them. I labeled the inside of the case top with the sizes, which helps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Glaske

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pilot drill is junk, have to keep replacing it
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These hole saws are extremely sharp. The quick change arbor makes for easy changing between different sizes. Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Beaubouef

customer_reviews.title: the product looks like brand new
customer_reviews.text: Although it is used, the product looks like brand new !
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: For how much this kit costs they should be a ...
customer_reviews.text: For how much this kit costs they should be a little tougher, first time using it chipped 1/3rd of the teeth off one. Others already have a tooth here and there chipped only have 2 or 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: jcdillin

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool set
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for a guy who requested a hole cutter set. He hasn't tried it out yet but was very impressed with how sturdy the pieces are, how many size hole cutters there are and that they can be used to cut in both metal and wood
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: The welds on the seams are very poorly executed on some pieces which leads me to believe that there's a quality control issue. I can tell some of the pieces are misshapen, too. Also, on a few of the pieces the teeth are not uniform at the weld. This is going back!
customer_reviews.author: Orderman

customer_reviews.title: Why not for the price?
customer_reviews.text: This kit is nice for the money. its small enough to fit in my tool box. I haven't used them yet to say anything about performance however they seem of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: It's milwaukee , no need to say anything more. No other tool manufacturer can even come close .worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Dunleavy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Got fed up bringing home nice products like this from big box stores where a piece had been shoplifted out of it and the piece missing. Good product. All pieces are here!
customer_reviews.author: SandyFans

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 49-22-4025 13-Piece General Purpose Hole Dozer Hole Saw Kit
product_meta.description: - Ice Hardened cryogenically treated for up to 50% longer life - Optimized tooth form for up to 2X faster cutting - Wide, angled and offset slots for easy plug access - Bi-metal construction with 8% cobalt for increased wear resistance - Quick Release Arbor
feature_bullets: 13-Pc general purpose hole Dozer hole saw kit
The product is easy to use and easy to handle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars134 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
